Title: Relates to requiring helicopter pilots to have completed certain training before operating a helicopter within the state
Summary: Requires helicopter pilots to have completed a helicopter safety and risk management training course utilizing a flight simulator training device certified by either the federal aviation administration or the European aviation safety agency before operating a helicopter within the state.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring helicopter pilots to have completed certain training before operating a helicopter within the state
